org.ow2.chameleon.testing.helpers

Class BaseTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.testing.helpers.BaseTest

  • public class BaseTest
extends Object
    A class extended by pax exam test case. It contains common bundles and startup options.

    By default it builds a bundle from src/main/java and deploys it.

        Method to override to instruct pax exam to deploy iPOJO Composite.
        Returns:

        Method to override to instruct pax exam to deploy the Felix Config Admin.
        Returns:

      • deployTestBundle

        public boolean deployTestBundle()
        Method to override to instruct pax exam to not deploy the test bundle.
        Returns:
        true to deploy the test bundle.

        public boolean deleteTestBundle()
        Method to override to instruct pax exam to delete the test bundle if already built.
        Returns:
        true to delete the test bundle.

      • deployMockito

        public boolean deployMockito()
        Method to override to instruct pax exam to deploy Mockito and junit bundles.
        Returns:
        true to deploy Mockito and related bundles, false by default
